name: JMPR (itch)
description:
A bare-bones Zelda with no weapons, just a double jump, based on the Roc's Feather from the Gameboy Zelda titles. Avoid obstacles, find crystals and explore this small world build by Auroriax (with a bit of world design by Unidrax as well).

A quick project for the fifth Gameboy Jam, made in Game Maker Studio. Here's my GBJAM4 entry as well.
